Class SmartTargetEnemy

    public class SmartTargetEnemy
extends Entity
    The enemy type that follows the A* algorithm to hunt the player.

      • shortPathFind

        public int shortPathFind(int x,
                         int y,
                         int minDistance,
                         int distance)
        Finds the shortest Path and the route it will take to get there.
        Parameters:
        x - The current x coordinate that is being checked.
        y - The current x coordinate that is being checked.
        minDistance - The minimum distance to the player found so far.
        distance - the current distance from the original position in the current search.
        Returns:
        The minimum distance from the enemy to player found so far.
